docs.snippet: U.S. Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's campaign criticized the Iran nuclear deal and Democrat Hillary Clinton's support for it after a Reuters report that said the United States and its negotiating partners agreed "in secret" to allow...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's campaign criticized the Iran nuclear deal and Democrat Hillary Clinton's support for it after a Reuters report that said the United States and its negotiating partners agreed "in secret" to allow Iran to evade some restrictions.

headline.main: Trump Campaign Criticizes Iran Nuclear Deal Anew After Reuters Report
headline.print_headline: Trump Campaign Criticizes Iran Nuclear Deal Anew After Reuters Report

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump’s dual speeches in Mexico City and Phoenix were so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration were hard to discern....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s dual speeches in Mexico City and Phoenix were so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration were hard to discern.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump travels to Mexico for joint news conference with Pres Enrique Pena Nieto to remake his image on divisive issue of immigration hours before heading to Phoenix, where he renewed his promise to build wall and make Mexico pay for it; his two speeches are so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration are hard to discern.

headline.main: Donald Trump Gambles on Immigration but Sends Conflicting Signals
headline.print_headline: Trump Gambles on Immigration in Trip and Rally

byline.contributor: Azam Ahmed and Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: The president made his terrible summer worse by inviting the Republican candidate to his palace....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president made his terrible summer worse by inviting the Republican candidate to his palace.
docs.abstract: Ioan Grillo Op-Ed article argues Mexican Pres Enrique Pena Nieto's meeting with Donald Trump amounted to lost opportunity to rebuke Trump for his offensive positions regarding Mexicans and damaged Pena Nieto's public image; contends botched meeting reflects Pena Nieto's larger failings in governing major nation.

headline.main: Why Did Peña Nieto Invite Trump to Mexico?

docs.snippet: In Mexico, Mr. Trump said he focused on the two nations’ shared economic and security interests, and discussed his plan to build a border wall. In Arizona, what he said was startlingly different....
docs.lead_paragraph: In Mexico, Mr. Trump said he focused on the two nations’ shared economic and security interests, and discussed his plan to build a border wall. In Arizona, what he said was startlingly different.

headline.main: Highlights of Donald Trump’s Immigration Speech and Mexico Trip

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO, ALEX BURNS, MAGGIE HABERMAN and KIRK SEMPLE

docs.snippet: From Medicare to medical costs, more voters trust Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton to do a better job on health care issues facing the United States, according to a poll out Thursday. But they're not holding out hope for big impro...
docs.lead_paragraph: From Medicare to medical costs, more voters trust Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton to do a better job on health care issues facing the United States, according to a poll out Thursday. But they're not holding out hope for big improvements.

headline.main: Poll: More Voters Trust Clinton on Health Care
headline.print_headline: Poll: More Voters Trust Clinton on Health Care

docs.snippet: Donald Trump's aggressive rhetoric on illegal immigration has obscured a potentially historic policy shift — the Republican presidential nominee is the first major party candidate in modern memory to propose limiting legal immigration....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump's aggressive rhetoric on illegal immigration has obscured a potentially historic policy shift — the Republican presidential nominee is the first major party candidate in modern memory to propose limiting legal immigration.

headline.main: Trump Paints New Target on Legal Immigration
headline.print_headline: Trump Paints New Target on Legal Immigration

docs.snippet: U.S. Democrat Hillary Clinton raised about $143 million in August for her presidential bid and the Democratic Party, the her campaign announced on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Democrat Hillary Clinton raised about $143 million in August for her presidential bid and the Democratic Party, the her campaign announced on Thursday.

headline.main: Democrat Clinton Raised More Than $140 Million in August: Campaign
headline.print_headline: Democrat Clinton Raised More Than $140 Million in August: Campaign

docs.snippet: Wednesday was supposed to be the day Donald Trump clarified his immigration stance. But in a key speech on that subject, he misstated facts about immigration policy, life for those in the country illegally and their impact on the U.S. economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wednesday was supposed to be the day Donald Trump clarified his immigration stance. But in a key speech on that subject, he misstated facts about immigration policy, life for those in the country illegally and their impact on the U.S. economy.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump on Immigration
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump on Immigration
